short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter your inbox for real estate emails effortlessly. Find emails about bedrooms, bathrooms & more with our easy-to-use extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this Chrome Extension is to enhance email management by filtering and organizing emails related to real estate. The extension scans your inbox for keywords and phrases such as "bedrooms," "pool," "gym," and other real estate-related terms. By doing so, it allows users to effortlessly find and categorize emails that pertain to property inquiries, listings, and real estate transactions. This streamlined approach helps you stay organized and focused on important real estate communications without having to manually search through your inbox. Our extension is designed to be user-friendly and efficient, ensuring that users can quickly access relevant real estate emails with minimal effort.
